docs.title: 🔍 Data Logic Explorer
docs.text: Welcome! This portal is a searchable index of our 400+ data transformations.

docs.title: 🚀 Quick Start
docs.text:
• Search: Use the bar at the top (or press S) to find any logic by name or keyword.
  • Typo-Friendly: If you type "revnue," the search will still find "revenue_calc."

docs.title: 📋 Featured Transformations
docs.text:
• Customer Churn: Identifying 'At Risk' users based on 90-day inactivity.
  • Revenue Calculation: Logic for calculating Gross Revenue and order status filters.
  • Tax Compliance: VAT and GST application rules.

docs.title: 🛠 How it Works
docs.text: This documentation is a live reflection of our SQL code. When code is updated, these documents are automatically refreshed.

docs.title: Customer Churn Logic
docs.text: Identifies customers who haven't made a purchase in 100 days. - Source: dim_customers, fact_orders - Logic: DATEDIFF(day, last_order_date, CURRENT_DATE) > 100 - Definition: Labeled as 'At Risk' if they have a pending support ticket.

docs.title: Revenue Transformation
docs.text: This logic calculates Gross Revenue by joining sales headers with line items. - Source: raw_sales, raw_customers - Logic: SUM(price * quantity) excluding returns. - Business Rule: Only include 'Completed' status orders.

docs.title: Regional Tax Calculation Applies VAT and GST based on the shipping address country code. - Source: orders, ref_tax_rates - Logic: Multiplies subtotal by tax_rate where country_code matches. - Maintenance: Handled via the finance reference table.
